entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Edson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:17 p.m. MDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Smoke. Low 9.
entry.summary: Widespread smoke. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Smoke. High 18.
